originalText.text: This place has made me love going to the dermatologist. First of all the woman at the front desk is so insanely nice she’s one of the sweetest people ever and every employee I’ve interacted with is so nice and beyond helpful. You can really tell that they work to help people not just make money. I’ve never felt judged. 10 out of 10 would recommend to anyone I know.

text.text: This place has made me love going to the dermatologist. First of all the woman at the front desk is so insanely nice she’s one of the sweetest people ever and every employee I’ve interacted with is so nice and beyond helpful. You can really tell that they work to help people not just make money. I’ve never felt judged. 10 out of 10 would recommend to anyone I know.

originalText.text: Dr. Glaser was great.  She listened and thoroughly explained treatment and options moving forward.  Wait time was excellent and reception was very nice.  I also appreciate that it was quiet and calm, especially since it was an early appointment.  Highly recommend.

text.text: Dr. Glaser was great.  She listened and thoroughly explained treatment and options moving forward.  Wait time was excellent and reception was very nice.  I also appreciate that it was quiet and calm, especially since it was an early appointment.  Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Great experience. The inside is very aesthetically pleasing. Reception is patient and friendly. So far I'm liking my doctor as well!

text.text: Great experience. The inside is very aesthetically pleasing. Reception is patient and friendly. So far I'm liking my doctor as well!

originalText.text:
The administrative staff is a bit disorganized. You have to do a lot of follow- in the same day to get anything done.

The doctors seem okay. I’ll update my review in  a few months. This is a new doctor and a new visit.

originalText.text: Place was clean and nice. Everyone was friendly. Very professional and quickly seen at appointment.

text.text: Place was clean and nice. Everyone was friendly. Very professional and quickly seen at appointment.
